name: environment_scenario_describe_a_specific_cyoda_environment_and_see_what
description: Test case for: As a user, I want to describe a specific Cyoda environment and see what services are running in it.

parts.text: describe a specific Cyoda environment and see what services are running in it.

Which environment would you like me to describe? (e.g., `dev`, `staging`, `prod`). I will first check existence, then list the Cyoda platform services running in that environment.

[options-single-choice: Describe 'dev', Describe 'staging', Describe 'prod', List Environments]
